ygData.subject: OT - duel info needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry this is off topic, but I know this is an active list and need a quick answer. My level 14 rogue is engaged in a virtual duel via email with a level 45
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry this is off topic, but I know this is an active list and need a quick
answer.

My level 14 rogue is engaged in a virtual duel via email with a level 45
wizard. She's not out to kill me, just to get an item back. Currently I'm
immobilized and she's sitting a little ways in front of me medding.

My thought was to shoot an arrow and a skeleton that just spawned behind
her, then evade and hope that it would attack the medding 45 wizard in it's
path before continuing on to me. (I want it to stun her so I can flee
before she gets another root off)

What are the chances something like this would work in-game?

Thanks
Evulia, bard of 13 songs
Mead, rogue of 14 convictions
